alignObjectProperties.description: Align colons in multiline object literals (not applied with any of the JSON parsers).

spaceBeforeFunctionParen.description: Put a space before function parenthesis.

generatorStarSpacing.description: Add spaces around the star (*) in generator functions (before and after - from eslint).

yieldStarSpacing.description: Add spaces around the star (*) in yield* expressions (before and after - from eslint).

parenSpacing.description: Inserts extra spaces inside parentheses, the way how projects in the WordPress ecosystem.

indentChains.description: Print indents at the start of chained calls.

alignTernaryLines.description: Align ternary lines in case of multiline ternery term (default behavior, conflict with standard)

breakBeforeElse.description: Always add a line break before else.
